name: Physicians Own Pharmacy
overview:
As a medical practice, supplies represent a significant part of your operating budget. From gloves and syringes to surgical instruments and lab glassware, you rely on high quality medical equipment every day. However, if you’re ordering from a large, national medical supply company, you’re paying not only for equipment, but also to support an extensive network of sales, marketing and management staff.

Founded by physicians, POP Medical began with a simple idea: To lower medical supply prices by eliminating unnecessary expenses. Become a POP member and order straight from medical supply manufacturers, experience significant cost savings and exercise more control over the purchasing process.

POP Medical is the only resource physicians need for medical devices, supplies and pharmaceuticals. We combine state of the art technology and business process optimization to save you and your practice time and money.

Call us today for a no-obligation medical product analysis and to receive more information about joining POP Medical.
